articles.title: Putin confidante Dmitry Medvedev says Elon Musk will be president soon and US will have civil war in 2023 - India Today
articles.description: Former Russian President Dmitry Medvedev has made a wild 2023 prediction about Elon Musk, saying that he would be soon the president of the US and that America is headed for a civil war. Musk called predictions "epic".
articles.content: By Ankita Garg: Its that time of the year. As 2022 ends, everyone and their aunts are making some predictions for the new year. Now, former Russian president Dmitry Medvedev, who is also a very close… [+2514 chars]

articles.title: US storm: Buffalo city blizzard like a 'war zone' - RNZ
articles.description: A severe winter storm that has swept across North America has left the city of Buffalo, New York, looking like a war zone, the state governor has said.
articles.content:
Vehicles trapped under heavy snow in the streets of downtown Buffalo, New York state, 26/12/22 Photo: AFP/ Office of the New York state governor

articles.title: FBI warns about 'pig butchering' crypto scam sweeping America - Newshub
articles.description: The FBI says America has a "pig butchering" problem.
articles.content:
The term pig butchering refers to an unsuspecting victim -- the "pig" -- being tricked by scammers into forking over money for a promised high rate of return.

articles.title: Glass act: Scientists reveal secrets of frog transparency - The Pantagraph
articles.description: A species of glass frogs found in South and Central America has the rare ability to turn on and off its transparent appearance.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Now you see them, now you dont.
